sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { User, Heart, Activity, Thermometer, Droplets } from 'lucide-react'; import './PatientWidgets.css'; const PatientWidgets = ({ patients }) => { if (!patients || patients.length === 0) { return (

Patient Overview

No patients found.

); } return (

Patient Overview

{patients.map((patient) => (

{patient.name}

Age: {patient.age}

{patient.healthData && (
Heart Rate {patient.healthData.heart_rate_avg ? `${patient.healthData.heart_rate_avg} bpm` : 'N/A'}
Blood Pressure N/A
Temperature N/A
Oxygen N/A
)}

Email: {patient.email}

Phone: {patient.phone_number}

))}
); }; export default PatientWidgets;
